edu.uidaho.junicon.interpreter.interpreter

Interface IPropertiesExtender

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IInterpreter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractShell, CommandShell, Environment, JuniconInterpreter, PropertiesExtender, TransformInterpreter

    public interface IPropertiesExtender
    IPropertiesExtender extends Properties with setters for changeable delegation of its defaultProperties, as well as load() and store() methods that operate on strings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearProperties()
      Clear properties map.
      Properties getDefaultDefaultProperties()
      Get default defaultProperties to be used unless overriden.

      Get underlying properties, from this owner or the delegate if set.

      Get properties delegate.

      Gets the value for the specified key in the property list.
      Collection<String> getPropertyNames()
      Gets set of property names (domain for map), including default properties.

      Load the properties from a string representing a properties file.

      Set defaultProperties, for this or the delegate if set.

      Set defaultProperties to System.Properties.

      Delegate properties to another Properties.

      Delegate properties to the given IPropertiesExtender.

      Sets the value for the specified key in the property list.
      String storeProperties()

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultDefaultProperties

        Properties getDefaultDefaultProperties()
        Get default defaultProperties to be used unless overriden.

      • setDefaultDefaultProperties

        void setDefaultDefaultProperties(Properties defaultProperties)
        Set default defaultProperties to be used unless overriden.

      • getProperty

        String getProperty(String key)
        Gets the value for the specified key in the property list.

      • getProperty

        String getProperty(String key,
                   String defaultValue)
        Gets the value for the specified key in the property list. If not found the default value is returned.

      • setProperty

        Object setProperty(String key,
                   String value)
        Sets the value for the specified key in the property list.

      • getProperties

        Properties getProperties()
        Get underlying properties, from this owner or the delegate if set. If delegating to another extender, gets its current Properties. Always returns non-null.

      • setProperties

        void setProperties(Properties properties)
        Delegate properties to another Properties. Ignored if properties is null.

      • setPropertiesDelegate

        void setPropertiesDelegate(IPropertiesExtender extender)
        Delegate properties to the given IPropertiesExtender. Methods will then use the properties for the given extender. Takes priority over a delegate Properties. Ignored if extender is null.

      • getPropertiesDelegate

        IPropertiesExtender getPropertiesDelegate()
        Get properties delegate.

      • getDefaultProperties

        Properties getDefaultProperties()
        Get defaultProperties, for this or the delegate if set. If a delegate is set to a Properties instead of an Extender, returns null, as this is not allowed.

      • setDefaultProperties

        void setDefaultProperties(Properties defaultProperties)
        Set defaultProperties, for this or the delegate if set. If a delegate is set to a Properties instead of an Extender, this is not allowed.

      • setDefaultProperties

        void setDefaultProperties(IPropertiesExtender parent)
        Set defaultProperties using parent IPropertiesExtender's properties. Ignored if parent is null.

      • setDefaultPropertiesToSystem

        void setDefaultPropertiesToSystem(boolean useSystemProperties)
        Set defaultProperties to System.Properties.

      • setAddProperties

        void setAddProperties(Properties additions)
        Add entries to properties map.

      • clearProperties

        void clearProperties()
        Clear properties map. Does not alter defaultProperties.

      • getPropertyNames

        Collection<String> getPropertyNames()
        Gets set of property names (domain for map), including default properties.

      • storeProperties

        String storeProperties()
                throws IOException
        Returns this property list as a string in a format suitable for loading using load().
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadProperties

        void loadProperties(String propertiesText,
                    boolean isWindowsIni)
             throws IOException
        Load the properties from a string representing a properties file.
        Parameters:
        isWindowsIni - Is Windows and not Java properties file, so backslashes need to be escaped.
        Throws:
        IOException
